alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 3:17PM CDT until April 12 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie affecting Richland County. .The Wild Rice River at Abercrombie is on the rise and is expected to reach minor flood stage by Saturday, April 9th before falling bacck down to action stage by Monday, April 11th. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie. * WHEN...From late Friday night to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 6.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 10.5 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
